titles.title: A resolution designating April 30, 2007, as "Dia de los Ninos: Celebrating Young Americans", and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5313)
Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
5/1/2007--Passed Senate without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Designates April 30, 2007, as "Dia de Los Ninos: Celebrating Young Americans."
